title: A Steady Decline

en: I've noticed your metrics are off, #NAME. You've submitted some real junk lately.
Get it together. If this lasts much longer, I'm not sure your job here will last.

yes_caption: I'm sorry Boss. It won't happen again.

en: You lay off your own work tonight to catch up with your full-time job.
There just aren't enough hours in the day...
